channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 23, 14th January
item.description:
There is a growing depression in the road, indicative of a sink hole. This location has already had 2 tons of subsurface expanding polymer resin injected to stabilise the ground, but it continues to sink and cause subsidence to properties in the area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southampton Road, Gospel Oak, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover broken and huge hole exposed, 14th January
item.description:
There's a manhole cover thats directly outside heath house on main road, this has broken and falled in on itself. There is a huge hole thats exposed where this was and residents are worried someone may fall, a cyclist may fall into this or even a car tyer could go down its that large. Please can someone see to this asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Road, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass verge on a20 before luxfield road fly tip, 14th January
item.description:
There is a little grass verge with trees on a20 before you turn left into luxfield se9. It is full of rubbish, cans which have been there over seven months. More being added daily. Please keep our area tidy.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sidcup Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface has collapsed, 14th January
item.description:
The road surface has pretty much collapsed. There are numerous potholes and road surface subsidence. This is a VERY busy junction throughout the day and it is possible that a vehicle will lose control and cause an accident when trying to navigate turning into Tudor Way from Petts Wood Road. This needs to be attended immediately.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 125, Petts Wood Road, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain on Green Lane in bus lane, 14th January
item.description:
Drain completely blocked and water flowing down road into Belmont Lane. It has not rained since yesterday. Now 15.05. Ice hazard if freezes. On edge of bus lane outside Chislehurst Shoe Repairs

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dirty staircase still not cleaned, 14th January
item.description:
I made a report yesterday regarding rubbish and urine on communal staircase leading to the apartments. I have just received notification that the issue has been solved however this is not the case. The communal staircase remains dirty and loaded with rubbish and urine

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 116, Sedgmoor Place, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins need cleaning, 14th January
item.description:
The bins by the bus stop outside the fight city gym need clean. I reported these a few days ago and you said you would not clean them as they did not belong to you. I have talked to the estate office of elephant Park, and they say that the bins on the New Kent Road belong to Southwark which is why they are so disgusting! Please would you give this bin a good clean and also remove the other scruffy old labels from them which are faded and tatty, thank you ever so much.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Kent Road, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
